Performance:
July 1996: Sasayaki no take

Production: July 1996

Play: Sasayaki no take (ささやきの竹)

Scenes:

Act 1 (第一幕 / Dai ichimaku)

Act 2 (第二幕 / Dai nimaku)

Characters:

Peddler from Ohara (Oharame / 大原女)

Bamboo peddler (Kurama no takeuri / 鞍馬の竹売り)

Male pedestrian (Tsukō no otoko / 通行の男)

Female pedestrian (Tsukō no onna / 通行の女)

Chief adviser to the Emperor (Kanpaku / 関白)

Hooded woman (Katsugi wo kabutta onna / かつぎをかぶった女)

Saikobo (Saikobō / 西光坊)

Saemon (Saemon no Jō / 左衛門の尉)

Saemon's wife (Jō no tsuma / 尉の妻)

Saemon's daughter (Jō no musume / 尉の娘)

Servant (Genin / 下人)

Servant to chief advisor (Kanpaku no kerai / 関白の家来)

Priest in charge of Accounting (Nassho Bōzu / 納所坊主)

Saburobei (Hakusho Saburobei / 百姓三郎兵衛)

Calf (Koushi / 小牛)
